host.title: Connect to your installation
host.description: Provide the host or IP address for the Niko Home Control installation. If you use an IP address, make sure it does not change.

statistics_options.title: Statistics Configuration
statistics_options.description:
Configure how measurements should be retrieved from your controller **{host}**.

**Enable statistics**: Periodically retrieves measurement data via REST API and imports as statistics.

**Import statistics**: One-time import of long term data (up to 10 years back as daily aggregates, last two months as hourlies).

**Note**: Long term import can take some time depending on how much data is available. Recent data will be updated automatically every hour if statistics are enabled.

reconfigure_use_token.description:
Reconfiguring controller **{host}**.

Due to upcoming cybersecurity regulations, it will no longer be possible to control you Niko Home Control setup using username/password from version 2.23 onwards. Please switch to token-based authentication.

A Hobby API token can be retrieved via the Connected Services section in the Niko Home Control programming software.
